name: Circus Games (Keypunch Software)
overview: Come one...come all...to the world famous circus games! Enter the Big Top and actually become a part of the fabulous Circus! Hear the lions and tigers growl in thier cages, smell the sawdust underneath your feet, and feel the crowd's eyes upon you as you prepare for the incredible feats of skill and daring! Four action-packed activities in all! Unicycle rider Richie Tightrope Timmie Seal Trainer Sam Trapeze Artist Tommie
